name: @aurore-cv/app
changelogs: Ajout de la page de portfolio

scripts.populate-cache:
cd www; git ls-files --cached --others --exclude-standard | grep -E -v 'maintenance|jsconfig|node_modules|package-lock' | jq -R -s 'split("
") | map(select(. != ""))'> ./src/json/cache.json; cd ..
scripts.populate: npm run populate-pwa; npm run populate-cache
